name: Ark Defense
description:
2022 A.D. - Humanity is at the brink of extinction. The last brilliant minds of the Empire of the Man have banded together to create a final glimmer of hope - The Last Ark - A space station, the scale of which was never seen before. A beacon of hope for the remaining Homo Sapiens of the galaxy. And you are brightest of them all or perhaps the most foolish? It does not matter now, you have to lead the Ark to its final days - this is your last mission. Glory to the Empire

Task: 

•Expand and defend your space station.

Controls:

• Move the cursor and Left-Click to shoot

• AWSD or the Arrow Keys to move.

• Left-Click a card to select a building, Right-Click to cancel

• Input the Cheat Code at the bottom-right of the screen to get Intergalactic Help (After shooting down a green glowing orb)
